name: nextcloud-link
description: Javascript API to talk to Nextcloud

scripts.build: rimraf lib && rimraf bundle && npm run build:web && npm run build:node && npm run build:packageJson
scripts.docker: npm run docker:stop && docker-compose -p nextcloud-link up -d
scripts.test: npm run docker && npm run await-nextcloud && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --config jest.conf.json --runInBand; npm run docker:stop
scripts.test-ci: npm run docker && npm run await-nextcloud && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --config jest.conf.json --runInBand
scripts.test-watch: npm run docker && npm run await-nextcloud && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --config jest.conf.json --runInBand --watch
scripts.fast-test-watch: npm run await-nextcloud && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --config jest.conf.json --runInBand --watch
scripts.fast-test-watch-nostart: npm run await-nextcloud && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest --config jest.conf.json --runInBand --watch --testNamePattern=stopTestingAtStart
